changeSet.author: awallace
changeSet.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW','FFFS_LOC_IDS') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW.FFFS_LOC_IDS', 'LOCATION_IDS', 'COLUMN';

rollback.sql: IF COL_LENGTH('${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW','LOCATION_IDS') IS NOT NULL EXEC sp_rename '${fffsWebPortalStagingDbStagingSchema}.COASTAL_DISPLAY_GROUP_WORKFLOW.LOCATION_IDS', 'FFFS_LOC_IDS', 'COLUMN';
